name: Lucario
author: NC Empire
flavor_text: It controls waves known as auras, which are powerful enough to pulverize huge rocks. It uses these waves to take down its prey.

abilities.name: Roaring Resolve
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for a {F} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere Volley
attacks.effect: Discard all {F} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 60 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.
